While under the effect of Army's Paeon with at least one stack of Repertoire, singing Mage's Ballad or the Wanderer's Minuet will grant Army's Muse, reducing weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay. Duration: 10s Allowing the effect of Army's Paeon and accumulated stacks of Repertoire to expire without singing Mage's Ballad or the Wanderer's Minuet will grant Army's Ethos. Duration: 30s While under the effect of Army's Ethos, singing Mage's Ballad or the Wanderer's Minuet will grant Army's Muse. Both Army's Ethos and Army's Muse require stacks of Repertoire, the number of which will determine the potency of the latter. 1 Repertoire: 1% 2 Repertoire: 2% 3 Repertoire: 4% 4 Repertoire: 12%

Casting of certain fire and ice spells will grant a stack of Astral Fire and Umbral Ice respectively. Maximum Stacks: 1 Duration: 15s While under the effect of Astral Fire, the cost of casting Fire spells is doubled, MP recovery is reduced to 0, and the potency of Ice spells is reduced by 10%. While under the effect of Umbral Ice, the cost of casting Ice spells is reduced to 0, 2,500 MP is recovered upon landing an Ice spell, and the potency of Fire spells is reduced by 10%.

Extends the duration of Nascent Flash and Nascent Glint to 8 seconds. Grants Stem the Flow to target, reducing damage taken by 10%. Duration: 4s Grants Stem the Tide to target, nullifying damage equivalent to a heal of 400 potency. Duration: 20s
Grants healing over time to self. Cure Potency: 200 Duration: 15s
Allows a third charge of Onslaught.
Reduces recast time of Shadowstride by 5 seconds when executing Unmend on most targets.

Upgrades Flood of Shadow executed by your simulacrum to Shadowbringer, which delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before it with a potency of 570 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies.
Upgrades Heart of Stone to Heart of Corundum.
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Aurora. Maximum Charges: 2
Become Ready to Blast after executing Burst Strike. Duration: 10s Continuation changes to Hypervelocity while under the effect of Ready to Blast.
Increases Powder Gauge capacity to 3 Cartridges. Executing Bloodfest stores 3 Cartridges.
Upgrades Bootshine to The Forbidden Chakra and Steel Peak to The Forbidden Chakra.
Upgrades Inspirited Meditation to Enlightened Meditation and Howling Fist to Enlightenment.
Upgrades Arm of the Destroyer to Shadow of the Destroyer.
Allows a third charge of Thunderclap.
Guarantees that a chakra will open when you are under the effect of Meditative Brotherhood and execute a weaponskill or cast a spell.

When under the effect of Perfect Balance, grants Beast Chakra in accordance with the form granted by the executed weaponskills. Weaponskills granting opo-opo form will also grant Coeurl Chakra. Weaponskills granting raptor form will also grant Opo-opo Chakra. Weaponskills granting coeurl form will also grant Raptor Chakra.
Increases the potency of Jump to 320.

Grants the effect of Draconian Fire after successfully completing a combo with Coerthan Torment. Duration: 30s Effect of Draconian Fire ends upon execution of any melee weaponskill. Upgrades Doom Spike to Draconian Fury while under the effect of Draconian Fire.
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Spineshatter Dive. Maximum Charges: 2
Upgrades Full Thrust to Heavens' Thrust and Chaos Thrust to Chaotic Spring. Also increases the potency of Drakesbane to 400.
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Life Surge. Maximum Charges: 2
Increases Ninki Gauge by 15 upon successfully completing a combo with Aeolian Edge or Armor Crush.
Increases the potency of Bhavacakra to 500 while under the effect of Meisui. Duration: 30s
Grants a stack of Raiju Ready upon executing Raiton. Maximum Stacks: 3 Duration: 30s Effect of Raiju Ready ends upon execution of any melee weaponskill.
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Tsubame-gaeshi. Maximum Charges: 2
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Meikyo Shisui. Maximum Charges: 2 Also grants the effect of Tsubame-gaeshi Ready upon executing Meikyo Shisui. Duration: 30s
Upgrades Quick Nock to Ladonsbite.
Allows a third charge of Bloodletter and Rain of Death.
Grants Blast Arrow Ready upon executing Apex Arrow after the Soul Voice Gauge has reached 80 or higher. Duration: 10s Apex Arrow becomes Blast Arrow while under this effect.
Reduces Troubadour recast time to 90 seconds.
Grants Mage's Coda, Army's Coda, or Wanderer's Coda upon singing Mage's Ballad, Army's Paeon, or the Wanderer's Minuet respectively.
Upgrades Spread Shot to Scattergun.
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Reassemble. Maximum Charges: 2
After executing Pile Bunker, the Automaton Queen will also execute Crowned Collider.
Reduces Tactician recast time to 90 seconds.
Grants Flourishing Finish after executing Technical Finish. Duration: 30s Technical Finish becomes Tillana while under this effect.
Increases Esprit Gauge by 10 upon successfully landing Reverse Cascade, Fountainfall, Rising Windmill, or Bloodshower.
Grants Fourfold Fan Dance upon executing Flourish. Duration: 30s
Reduces Shield Samba recast time to 90 seconds.
Grants Flourishing Starfall upon executing Devilment. Duration: 20s

Allows the stacking of a second Astral Fire and Umbral Ice. While under the effect of Astral Fire, the potency of Fire spells is increased by 60% and the potency of Ice spells is reduced by 20%. While under the effect of Umbral Ice, 5,000 MP is recovered upon landing an Ice spell and the potency of Fire spells is reduced by 20%.

Allows the stacking of a third Astral Fire and Umbral Ice. Casting Fire II or Blizzard II grants maximum stacks of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice respectively. While under the effect of Astral Fire III, the potency of Fire spells is increased by 80%, and the cast time of Ice spells is halved and potency lowered by 30%. While under the effect of Umbral Ice III, 10,000 MP is recovered upon landing an Ice spell, and the cast time of Fire spells is halved and potency lowered by 30%.
Increases damage dealt by 5% while under the effect of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice.
Allows for the immediate casting of Foul.
Upgrades Fire II and Blizzard II to High Fire II and High Blizzard II.
Reduces Manafont recast time to 100 seconds.
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Sharpcast. Maximum Charges: 2

Adds a Paradox marker to your Elemental Gauge. The marker is made active after reaching Umbral Ice III and gaining 3 Umbral Hearts then swapping to the opposite element. The marker is made inactive when the effect of Astral Fire expires. Fire becomes Paradox when the Paradox marker is made active.
Grants Ruby Arcanum and Topaz Arcanum upon executing Aethercharge.
Grants Ruby Arcanum, Topaz Arcanum, and Emerald Arcanum upon executing Aethercharge.
Upgrades Summon Ruby to Summon Ifrit.
Upgrades Summon Topaz to Summon Titan.
Upgrades Summon Emerald to Summon Garuda.
Enhances the signature attack of summons, upgrading Ifrit-Egi's Burning Strike to Inferno, Titan-Egi's Rock Buster to Earthen Fury, and Garuda-Egi's Aerial Slash to Aerial Blast.
Upgrades Ruin II to Ruin III.
Upgrades Aethercharge to Dreadwyrm Trance.
Grants Further Ruin upon executing Energy Drain or Energy Siphon.
Enhances Gemshine according to your current elemental attunement. Fire Attunement Upgrade: Ruby Rite Earth Attunement Upgrade: Topaz Rite Wind Attunement Upgrade: Emerald Rite
Upgrades Outburst to Tri-disaster.

Enhances Precious Brilliance according to your current elemental attunement. Fire Attunement Upgrade: Ruby Catastrophe Earth Attunement Upgrade: Topaz Catastrophe Wind Attunement Upgrade: Emerald Catastrophe
Increases the potency of Ruin III to 310, Ruby Rite to 510, Topaz Rite to 330, and Emerald Rite to 230.
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Radiant Aegis. Maximum Charges: 2
Upgrades Summon Ifrit to Summon Ifrit II, Summon Titan to Summon Titan II, and Summon Garuda to Summon Garuda II.

Adds a Mana Stack to your Balance Gauge upon landing Enchanted Riposte, Enchanted Zwerchhau, Enchanted Redoublement, Enchanted Moulinet, Enchanted Moulinet Deux, or Enchanted Moulinet Trois, up to a maximum of 3. Upon gaining 3 Mana Stacks, Verthunder and Verthunder II are upgraded to Verflare. Upon learning Verholy, gaining 3 Mana Stacks also upgrades Veraero and Veraero II to Verholy.
Upgrades Verthunder to Verthunder III and Veraero to Veraero III. Upon gaining 3 Mana Stacks, Verthunder III is upgraded to Verflare and Veraero III is upgraded to Verholy.

Upgrades Jolt II to Jolt III. Also increases the potency of Enchanted Riposte to 280, Verthunder II to 140, Veraero II to 140, Verfire to 340, Verstone to 340, Enchanted Zwerchhau to 150, Enchanted Redoublement to 130, Impact to 210, and Enchanted Reprise to 340.
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Acceleration. Maximum Charges: 2
Increases maximum stacks of Manafication to 6.
Upgrades Glare to Glare III.
Upgrades Holy to Holy III.

Increases the healing potency of Cure to 500, Medica to 400, Cure II to 800, Regen to 250, Cure III to 600, Medica II to 250, Medica II's Regen effect to 150, Afflatus Solace to 800, and Afflatus Rapture to 400.
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Divine Benison. Maximum Charges: 2
Upgrades Broil III to Broil IV and increases the potency of Ruin II to 220.
Upgrades Art of War to Art of War II.
Increases the healing potency of Physick to 450, Embrace to 180, and Seraphic Veil to 180. Increases the barrier potency of Adloquium to 180% the amount healed and Succor to 160% the amount healed.
Reduces Deployment Tactics recast time to 90 seconds.
Grants Clarifying Draw after executing Draw.
Grants a Solar Sign, Lunar Sign, or Celestial Sign according to your arcanum played in combat.
Upgrades Malefic IV to Fall Malefic.
Upgrades Gravity to Gravity II.

Increases the healing potency of Benefic to 500, Helios to 400, Benefic II to 800, Aspected Benefic to 250, Aspected Benefic's Regen effect to 250, Aspected Helios to 250, and Aspected Helios's Regen effect to 150.
